1.3.name: wordpress/wp-externalfeed
1.3.description: TDisplays links from del.icio.us, Technorati, Reddit, Digg and TailRank that is relevant to the current category of your blog. Eg: Your visitor browses the ÔhumorÕ category of your blog; the links will come from Òhttp://del.icio.us/tags/humorÓ and so on. This means that you do not have to change any code for each specific category.
